message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective on the price. Considering the value this product brings, I could come down to $12,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
